title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.9 - Denomination of pari-mutuel tickets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.9 - Denomination of pari-mutuel tickets

State Regulations
(a) [Reserved]
(b) Upon permission
granted by the commission, a pari-mutuel ticket combining win and place, win
and show, or place and show, may be sold for $3, and a pari-mutuel ticket
combining win, place and show may be sold for $5. The permission granted
pursuant to this subdivision may be upon such conditions and for such period of
time as the commission may prescribe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4122.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
